title: 162 19 "Chopper in Danger! Former God vs. Priest Shura!"Transliteration: "Choppā ayaushi! Moto kami VS Shinkan Shura" (Japanese:チョッパー危うし!元神VS神官シュラ) Munehisa Sakai Junki Takegami August 3, 2003(2003-08-03)[45] February 9, 2008[46][47]
